CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Phone_Verification_Status__c))), CASE( Phone_Verification_Status__c, 'Valid', IMAGE('/resource/1571315899000/tdc_tsw__resource_sms_file/img/ValidPhone.png','Valid'), 'Invalid', IMAGE('/resource/1571315899000/tdc_tsw__resource_sms_file/img/InvalidPhone.png','Invalid'), Result__c) + ' ' + BR() + Verified_Phone__c ,IMAGE('/resource/tdc_tsw__resource_sms_file/img/Notverified1.png','Not Verified Yet'))
CustomField.label: Phone Status
